en.seo_h2_primary: The Fastest & Most Secure URL Shortener Tool ğŸš€
en.seo_p_intro: Shortlinks.art is your free solution for professional link management. We offer lightning-fast link generation, advanced analytics tracking, and full privacy controls for every link you create.
en.seo_h3_features: Core Features for Professional Link Management ğŸ› ï¸
en.seo_feature_1: Create Branded Custom Short Links (e.g., short.link/your-word).
en.seo_feature_2: Detailed Click Analytics and Performance Tracking.
en.seo_feature_3: No Registration Required: Quick link generation for everyone.
en.seo_h3_security: Secure URL Shortener & Privacy Controls ğŸ”’
en.seo_security_1: Guaranteed protection against malicious links and URL injections.
en.seo_security_2: Links are secured with unique, non-guessable deletion tokens.
en.seo_security_3: Strict data privacy policy: We never sell your link click data.

arr.error_invalid_url: That URL be cursed! Enter a proper one, ye scallywag.
arr.error_length_min: Must be at least {limit_value} characters, or walk the plank!
arr.error_invalid_chars: Invalid characters! Only letters and numbers, matey.
arr.error_validation_failed: Validation failed! Check yer map again.
arr.tagline: A secure, fast, and feature-rich URL shortener, ye landlubber. âš¡
arr.long_url_placeholder: Heave yer long URL here, savvy?
arr.dashboard_tagline: Here be the log of yer plunder! All the links ye sent to sea.
arr.login_required: Where be yer Letter of Marque? ğŸ”‘
arr.enter_owner_id_prompt: Input yer captain's code to see yer treasure chest.
arr.seo_h2_primary: The Swiftest & Safest Link-Shortenin' Tool, Savvy? ğŸ´â€â˜ ï¸
arr.seo_p_intro: Shortlinks.art be yer free chest o' link management treasure. We offer links faster than a cannonball, fine tracking o' yer plunder, and strict secrecy for every map ye set sail.
arr.seo_h3_features: The Tools of a Master Privateer ğŸ› ï¸
arr.seo_feature_1: Forge Yer Own Branded Marks (e.g., short.link/yer-booty).
arr.seo_feature_2: Detailed Logbooks of Every Click (Click Analytics).
arr.seo_feature_3: No Need to Sign the Ship's Muster: Quick links for every scallywag.
arr.seo_h3_security: Secure Yer Ship and Yer Loot! ğŸ›¡ï¸
arr.seo_security_1: Guaranteed defense against the Kraken's tentacles (malicious links).
arr.seo_security_2: Yer links are sealed with a one-time secret key for sinkin'.
arr.seo_security_3: Strict code of conduct: We never sell yer plunder logs.
arr.seo_h3_cta: Ready to Heave Anchor and Shorten Yer First Voyage?
arr.create_link_now: Sail the Ship! Shorten Yer Link Now! ğŸš¢
arr.shorten_success_title: Victory! Yer link be ready! ğŸ‰
arr.generic_error_message: A giant squid grabbed yer request!
arr.network_error_message: A storm hit our masts! Try again.
arr.error_creating_link: ğŸš¨ Shiver me timbers! That URL be leaky.
arr.link_expired: The grog has run out! ğŸ’€
arr.preview_summary_pending: The parrot is whisperin' the summary...
arr.token_missing: Yer pirate credentials be needed! âŒ
